title: I can't buy vandal jax off the snowdown shop
body:
I have received vandall jax as one of my snowdown offers and I wish to buy the skin however it always comes up with an error stating that I may not buy it and I must try again. Please help as I really want this skin. I'm fairly new to league.

Screenshot: https://gyazo.com/47e6c2fca5ac9becb3b014e598ccd18f

I was able to buy another skin off the snowdown shop in my offers (Red Riding Annie), however it just doesn't work when I try to purchase Vandall Jax.

replies.body:
Hey niUq,

Can you provide a screenshot of the issue you're encountering and any additional information? It'll definitely help in diagnosing the issue and resolving it efficiently!

Screenshot: https://gyazo.com/47e6c2fca5ac9becb3b014e598ccd18f

I was able to buy another skin off the snowdown shop in my offers (Red Riding Annie), however it just doesn't work when I try to purchase Vandall Jax.

I'm not sure why you're getting that error, but if you don't want to go through a lot of work, you could just wait for the Vandal Jax skin sale on December 28, 2015. Otherwise, I'd advise submitting a post in the [**Report a Bug**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) sub-boards so they can look further into the issue. 

Here's the list of the sales that are coming up:
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/caution-snowstorm-sale-incoming
